about_the_game:
Puzzle Girls: Alexa is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.
Featuring artwork from the Dharker Studio game Alexa's Wild Night, including unseen images that didnt make the final game.

This DLC expands the base free-to-play puzzle game with additional scenes, levels and ADULT, lewd, not safe for work content.

Content:

  • Additional 12 Illustration Scene Sets
  • Hundreds of variant image puzzles to look through
  • One handed Controls for easy play!
  • Exclusive never before seen images
  • A variety of Adult Content Puzzles

Bonus Features:

  • Unlockable Art Gallery (to view completed illustration puzzles)
  • Achievements based on the DLC Levels added

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity and sexual content images.
- Artwork depicting consensual sex, threesomes, lesbians, outdoor sex.
- Not suitable for watching at work.
- Not suitable for all ages.

All characters depicted in the game are at least 18 years of age or older.
